decisions.name: Unit_not_owned_not_potential_trade_Task_for_unit_owner
decisions.label: Unit not owned not potential trade Task for unit owner

Flow.description: Multiple tasks related to the unit are created on the basis of updates made in the Unit.

formulas.description: Used to change the date to 5 days later from today.
formulas.name: After5Days
UnitPurchasedDropPrice
formulas.expression: 'Unit was purchased' + TEXT({!$Record.CL_Post_Age__c}) + 'days ago. Drop price accordingly. If 180 days old, consider auction.'

Flow.label: Unit - Unit Autotasks

value.stringValue: Confirm unit availability; see if anything else available for sale; deactivate unit if not available.

recordCreates.name: No_of_Photos_on_GD_Changed
recordCreates.label: No of Photos on GD Changed

value.stringValue: Number of photos on GD changed. Plz organize pics/remove unnecessary pics, update pics on MT, IC, and CL. Task WH to update FB photos if owned.

recordCreates.name: Price_Drop_MC_Email_update_MT_CG_IC_Prices
recordCreates.label: Price Drop MC Email, update MT/CG/IC Prices

value.stringValue: [Sandip] Create a price-drop MailChimp email. [IF MT LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Pricing on MT to reflect Starting Advertised Retail Price. [IF CL LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Craigslist Pricing to reflect Starting Advertised Retail Price; change CL Post date to today. [IF IC LISTING IS ACTIVE] Update Iron Connect pricing to reflect the Starting Advertised Retail Price
Check with unit owner whether it is ready to be relisted. If it is, relist it and UNCHECK the Unlist checkbox. IF it is not, ask when to relist and reassign this task for that date.
CL listing for this unit was added 30 days ago, please renew listing.

recordCreates.name: Send_matching_mail_via_Walkers_Acc_Task
recordCreates.label: Send matching mail via Walkers Acc Task

value.stringValue: Log into Walker's SF account and send matching on this unit from there.
Create a 2% commission URT for this Unit.

recordCreates.name: Task_for_Unit_Owner_unit_not_owned_not_potential_trade
recordCreates.label: Task for Unit Owner unit not owned not potential trade

value.stringValue: Update Seller's Original Asking Price field on the Unit Page
Unit has been deactivated, unlist from MT, CL, and IC. Task BN to unlist from FB if owned. Remove from marketing sheet - ensure not listed on IronSites (check unit page links)

recordCreates.name: Unlisting_unit_from_all_advertising_Task
recordCreates.label: Unlisting unit from all advertising Task

value.stringValue: Unlist unit from MT, CL, and all other iron sites. Task Collin to "remove from FB if appropriate" from the unit page.

recordCreates.name: Update_Commission_URT_based_on_Final_Sale_Price
recordCreates.label: Update Commission URT based on Final Sale Price

value.stringValue: Update the Commission URT from Final Sales Price
Complete Unit Details - use "Required information for owned units" doc as reference.

recordCreates.name: update_List_on_Iron_Connect_Task
recordCreates.label: update List on Iron Connect Task

recordCreates.name: update_Market_on_MT_and_Iron_Sites_Task
recordCreates.label: update Market on MT and Iron Sites Task

value.stringValue: Ensure unit marketed on MT and spot-check other IronSites to ensure it's listed accurately

recordCreates.name: update_Obtain_review_organize_photos_videos_Task
recordCreates.label: update Obtain, review, organize photos/videos Task

value.stringValue: Ensure full set of good photos is provided via inspection or via site contact. Remove not good/auction looking photos to Confidential Information folder.
Market on Craigslist in the city/region where unit is located; create follow-up task for 30-days out to repost.
Send UNADVERTISED Mailchimp to end users and equipment sellers; EXCLUDE account purchased from
Put Serial Number Photos in Online Photos folder, and on MT. Put full serial from the serial plate in Serial Number field on Unit Page.
Send to dealers via SF email
Obtain shipping dimensions from either inspection report or specalog. Put in Shipping Dims field in the Freight and Transport section of Unit Page.
Update unit details on MT, IC, and CL; task BN to update unit details on FB if owned unit

recordCreates.name: update_year_on_MT_CL_IC_Task
recordCreates.label: update year on MT, CL, IC Task

value.stringValue: The year on this unit has changed; update MT, CL, and IC (ONLY IF UNIT IS LISTED IN THOSE PLACES)

recordCreates.name: Updating_Location_MC_CL_and_IC_Task
recordCreates.label: Updating Location, MC, CL and IC Task

value.stringValue: Run Vague Location task, then update storage location on MT, CL, and IC. Task BN to update FB location for owned units. [Sandip] Location on this unit was updated; make required changes to CL and update CL Post Date field. If this unit has an Iron Connect listing, please update location. If it does not have an IC listing, please post in Team Z Group Chat and @post CM/HB/MJ to identify whether it should be posted on IC.

recordLookups.name: get_Opp_related_to_this_Unit
recordLookups.label: get Opp related to this Unit

recordUpdates.name: update_Purchase_Date_Of_This_Unit
recordUpdates.label: update Purchase Date Of This Unit

recordUpdates.name: update_Unit_address_details_by_Yard_address
recordUpdates.label: update Unit address details by Yard address
